div.p: Medical Dictionary for Regulatory Activities Terminology (MedDRA) Version 7.0, Portuguese Edition. International conference on Harmonization of Technical Requirements for Registration of Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH). Reston, VA: MedDRA MSSO, March 1, 2004. This is the Portuguese language version as encapsulated in the UMLS..
